
#Query to delete payments or disbursals with same txn_id for same loans for same amount

delete from loan_txns where id in(38520,39289,39443,41108,41930,44780,48471,50561,57776,63780,63788,63798,63824,63854,63932,63963,57580,42026,54103,49798,50363,55415,62786,49807,52994,60645,39193,27556,41938,48460,51104,51109,49893,57783,49901,61084,44792,45384,44200,55644,44492,63878,51227,51968,57048,62702,26549,36176,42019,47829,47832,48734,49650,49866,49925,49920,49918,60985,50628,51117,53256,56242,56395,56391,58468,61187,61104,61354,61514,62765,63586,43821,26156,63818,41807,44347,61534,41835,37330,56552,44664,41918,41657,44198,52668,51202,41928,57177,44360,57171,51522,60260,58919,49437,63939,61046,50809,60291,48896,40412,50875,63979,48208,44788,51129,57789,56226,40037,51537,55315,46172,43229,41899,57922,57763,51218,48890,41922,48431,50168,35701,50745,51601,48407,42581,50751,44190,62936,50291,37153,50710,58955,41687,41661,41114,44773,55277,44955,46868,57965,41693,39572,38995,40440,44775,64161,47316,50549,44355,44950,38524,42850,50696,36115,56899,43926,50741,45739,51208,54966,42713,38983,43786,39187,49843,50780,51490,50758,51079,50728,50719,41626,51573,39065,63868,41392,52962,44968,41683,58217,47092,27720,53428,38521,39290,39444,41109,41931,44781,48472,50562,57777,63781,63789,63799,63825,63855,63934,63964,39445,41110,63790,63800,63965,39446,63791,63802,63966,63792,63803);


delete from loan_txns where id in(46118,43098,51286,36361,37781,52573,42285,35609,50471,43387,38061,41694,26289,25980,26136,26526,26665,27342,27404,40754,40981,42310,38080,27499,62767,63063,48427,40902,40108,48453,44362,44232,45424,42013,40707,44399,42288,42789,27841,43419,41056,49933,44945,44758,44828,39954,44352,41660,27702,45420,39696,42933,51214,41891,42033,38415,42948,42935,36112,41050,42297,45199,46274,63973,42075,55147,41955,36966,48872,48289,44349,27660,38766,46832,40232,43380,41749,53965,56521,61665,40708,40982,41051,41057,41750,42014,42289,42298,42311,44353,44947,48290,40709,40983,42290,42299,48291,40710,40984,42300,42301);
